nodes.text: Cardooine was an astronomical object in the galaxy where the criminal Zann Consortium were active.

During the Imperial Era, the leader of the criminal Crimson Dawn syndicate asked a group of spacers to make amends for trouble they had caused the syndicate by eliminating its Zann Consortium rivals on Cardooine.

In the new Star Wars canon, Cardooine was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. Cardooine originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was created by Timothy Zahn for the 1993 novel The Last Command.
